text: Horlivka (; , Gorlovka) is a city of regional significance in Donetsk Oblast (province) of eastern Ukraine. In 2021, 241,106 people lived there. == Twin towns == Horlivka is twinned with: * Barnsley, England, United Kingdom * Pensacola, United States * Buffalo, United States Category:Cities in Donetsk Oblast
title: Horlivka
